title: The total ages of Ankit, Narendra and Satendra is 96 years. Five years ago, the ratio of their ages was 2 : 3 : 4. What is the present age of Satendra? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let current ages of ankit, narendra and satendra be a, n, s respectively. According to question a+n+s=96 ….(1) (a-5):(n-5):(s-5)=2:3:4 …(2) (a-5)+(n-5)+(s-5)=2k+3k+4k Here, k is some constant a+n+s-15=9k 9k=81 k=9 Therefore a-5=2k=18 a=23 n-5=3k=27 n=32 s-5=4k=36 s=41

Let the rational between their ages be x The total ages of Ankit, Narendra and Satendra is 96 years. Five years ago, the ratio of their ages was 2 : 3 : 4 Thus five years ago their ages were 2x , 3x and 4x 2x + 3x + 4x = 96 - 15 2x + 3x + 4x = 81 9x = 81 9x = 81 x = 81 / 9 x = 9 The rational is 9, Their present ages Ankit age. 2x + 5 = 2 × 9 + 5 = 23 years Narendra age 3x + 5 = 3 × 9 + 5 = 32 years Satendra age 4x + 5 = 4 × 9 + 5 = 41 years Answer Present age of Satendra is 41 years

Total of current ages of 3 persons 96. Before 5 years, age of each one was 5 years less; hence total 15 years less; total before 5 years=96–15=81 years.Total of 9 would give satendra's age 4. So, Satendra's age (then) 36 (and others 18 and 27). Current age oh Satendra 41 (others 23 and 32; all add up to 96). Ans.: 41 years.

Ankit’s age is A, Narendra’s is N and Satendra’s is S, as of now. A+N+S = 96, now Five ago A+N+S was 96-(3x5) = 81. 2x+3x+4x = 9x = 81, or x = 9 A = (2x9)+5 = 23, N = (3x9)+5 = 32 and S = (4x9)+5 = 41 as of now, Now, Ankit is 23, Narendra is 32 and Satendra is 41 years.
